list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an omnivorous domesticated hoofed mammal with sparse bristly hair and a flat snout for rooting in the soil, kept for its meat.
a greedy, dirty, or unpleasant person.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: you're such a pig when it comes to sleep
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bạn là một con lợn như vậy khi ngủ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an oblong mass of iron or lead from a smelting furnace.
a device which fits snugly inside an oil or gas pipeline and is sent through it to clean or test the inside, or to act as a barrier.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he'd pigged himself on the last of the food
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy đã lúm lại cho mình trên thức ăn cuối cùng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a sow) give birth to piglets; farrow.
operate a pig within an oil or gas pipeline.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they will carry out all trenching and pigging
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: họ sẽ thực hiện tất cả rãnh và lợn
